content:
Craft an item of type: oak_pressure_plate
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "beetroot_soup", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 27, "index": 19}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 58, "index": 26}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 25, "index": 33}, {"type": "orange_terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 38}, {"type": "structure_block", "quantity": 26, "index": 40}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 59, "index": 41}, {"type": "brown_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 41, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft an oak_pressure_plate, I need to place two oak_planks side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move one oak_plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: To craft an oak_pressure_plate, I need to place two oak_planks side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move another oak_plank from slot 11 to slot 2.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: Now that I have crafted the oak_pressure_plate, I will move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
